name: Tiana | Triangle pendant from colored pencils
description: Take a step into the world of colours and imagination with Matitta Kayu jewelry. Each piece in our collections is crafted out of colored pencils, put together using friendly materials and a lot of passion.
details: All accessories are from 925 sterling silver which will promise a lasting shine.
Necklace cord is about 70cm long and on order the cord color can be change to black.
The product comes with a beautiful handmade wooden box and can be the perfect gift.
The color may be slightly different from the picture because of different display device.
dimensions: Pendant: 4.5cm height x 5cm width x 7mm thickness; Necklace: 70cm long and 4mm thickness

name: Triangle
description: The unique triangle shelf etc.
details: The triangle shelf is made from beech wood and has a coat of a non-toxic Tung oil.
The mountain key holder is ready to be hanged on the wall and the package contains mounted hangers.
dimensions: 30cm height x 30 cm width x 10cm depth

description: This unique Mountain Key Holder makes a great housewarming or newlywed gift. It would be a great addition to any household, garage or office. Each Mountain Key Holder is made with our own hands in our workshop from natural beech wood, put together using friendly materials and a lot of passion.
details: The mountain key holder is made from beech wood and has a coat of a non-toxic Tung oil.
It comes with 5 key-ring to hang all your keys from.
The mountain key holder is ready to be hanged on the wall and the package contains mounted hangers.
dimensions: 15cm height x 15cm width x 18mm thickness

name: Coat Hanger
description: This unique coat hanger makes a great housewarming or newlywed gift. It would be a great addition to any household, garage or office. Each coat hanger is made with our own hands in our workshop from natural beech wood, put together using friendly materials and a lot of passion.
details: The coat hanger is made from beech wood and has a coat of a non-toxic Tung oil.
It comes with 20 dowels pins in four different lengths included: 4 x 40mm, 4 x 60mm, 4 x 80mm, 4 x 100mm, 4 x 120mm.
The coat hanger is ready to be hanged on the wall and the package contains mounted hangers.
dimensions: 100cm height x 20cm width x 18mm thickness

name: Bike Rack
description: The unique bike rack is a board with a lot of possibilities, you can decorate it the way you want or need. It is a place where you can storage your bike and equipment (jacket, helmet, bike shoes, backpack). You can have all in one place, easy to take when you want to escape on a quick bike ride after work.
details: The bike rack is made from beech wood and has a coat of a non-toxic Tung oil.
It comes with 20 dowels pins in four different lengths included: 4 x 40mm, 4 x 60mm, 4 x 80mm, 4 x 100mm, 4 x 120mm.
The rack is ready to be hanged on the wall and the package contains mounted hangers.
dimensions: 2 boards of 50cm length x 20cm width x 18mm thickness

name: Ski Rack
description: The unique ski rack is a board with a lot of possibilities, you can decorate it the way you want or need. It is a place where you can storage your ski and equipment (jacket, helmet, poles, backpack). You can have all in one place, easy to take when you want to a ski weekend.
details: The ski rack is made from beech wood and has a coat of a non-toxic Tung oil.
It comes with 20 dowels pins in four different lengths included: 4 x 40mm, 4 x 60mm, 4 x 80mm, 4 x 100mm, 4 x 120mm.
The rack is ready to be hanged on the wall and the package contains mounted hangers.
dimensions: 2 boards of 100cm length x 20cm width x 18mm thickness

name: Wooden Tic-Tac-Toe game
description: A game that never gets old! This classy and fun Tic Tac Toe game is perfect for your home and family. You can use it for fun and games or keep it as fun home decor. Tic tac toe makes an excellent travel game, a gifts, or just a way of developing your strategy skills.
details: The board is made from natural beech wood and has a coat of a non-toxic Tung oil.
The 9 dowel are from beech wood and have a coat of water based paint.
For storage the game has a bag made of cotton material.
Due to the small parts, it is not suitable for children under the age of four.
dimensions: 11.5cm length x 11.5cm width x 3cm thickness

name: Sewing Embroidery Board kit
description: Embroidery lacing activity board is a great way for your child to develop fine motor skills and also fun toy to play with. It is all natural hand made item and finishing is non-toxic Tung oil.
details: This is a great gift for your child!
Board comes with 4 pieces of yarn and 1 wood needle.
There are no sharp items included, so it is 100% safe to play with.
For storage the board has a bag made of cotton material.
Due to the small parts, it is not suitable for children under the age of four.
The board is made from natural beech wood and has a coat of a non-toxic Tung oil.
dimensions: 30cm length x 20cm width x 0.5cm thickness

name: Rubber band board
description: This is great learning toy for kids aged 5+. It helps promote creativity, fine motor skills and is great toy to learn numbers, letters and geometric object shapes.
details: This is a great gift for your child!
This geo-board has 64 wooden pins.
There are no sharp items included, so it is 100% safe to play with.
For storage the board has a bag made of cotton material.
Due to the small parts, it is not suitable for children under the age of four.
The board is made from natural beech wood and has a coat of a non-toxic Tung oil.
dimensions: 20cm length x 20cm width x 2cm thickness

name: Sale1
description: Fior di Sale comes from the salt plains of Tripani, where the wind blowing over the plains crystallizes the salt, which is then harvested manually. With lemon and peppermint essential oils, add this Fior di Sale to meat, fish, or vegetable dishes after cooking. Savor the fresh scent as you experiment with new combinations.
details: Has a cooling effect and is refreshing and uplifting.

imageDetailed.name: Sale2
imageDetailed.description: Fior di Sale comes from the salt plains of Tripani, where the wind blowing over the plains crystallizes the salt, which is then harvested manually. With lemon and peppermint essential oils, add this Fior di Sale to meat, fish, or vegetable dishes after cooking. Savor the fresh scent as you experiment with new combinations.
details: Has a cooling effect and is refreshing and uplifting.
Fabulous for feet, elbows, backs and hands.
